title: Crux Finance
summary: Crux Finance is an all-in-one platform for portfolio management and charting within the Ergo ecosystem. It will offer features such as portfolio tracking, charting, and other tools for decentralized finance (DeFi) users.

qa_pairs.question: What is Crux Finance?
qa_pairs.answer: Crux Finance is an all-in-one platform for portfolio management and charting within the Ergo ecosystem.

qa_pairs.question: What key features does Crux Finance offer?
qa_pairs.answer: Crux Finance offers portfolio management and charting capabilities.

qa_pairs.question: What is the website for Crux Finance?
qa_pairs.answer: The website for Crux Finance is cruxfinance.io.

qa_pairs.question: What type of application is Crux Finance?
qa_pairs.answer: Crux Finance is a dApp (decentralized application).

qa_pairs.question: What is the current status of Crux Finance?
qa_pairs.answer: Crux Finance is currently in the dApp-MVP (Minimum Viable Product) stage.

sections.heading: Crux Finance
sections.content: [cruxfinance.io](https://cruxfinance.io/) will offer an all-in-one platform for portfolio management and charting within the Ergo ecosystem.
